item.title: Git subtree
item.author: hello@akimul.com (Akimul Islam Akash)
item.description: Overview: Suppose, we have repository. We want to share another repository as a library between multiple repositories. In that case, we subtree the shared repository in other repositories. Usage and Commands: Let say, we have two repositoty parent and child. We want to use the child repo as subtree library in the parent repo. Initially, parent --a.py --b.py and child child --c.py --d.py adding subtree In order to add the child repo as subtree to the parent repo:
